SHR DBus Interface Specification

org.shr.phoneui.Messages

Description

The Messages Interface is used to show the different message screens, as the list of messages, a message itself or a screen to write a new message.

Namespace

org.shr.phoneui.Messages

Methods

  • DisplayList
  • DisplayMessage
  • CreateMessage

Signals

None

Errors

None

Methods

DisplayList ( a{sv} )

Parameters

a{sv}: filter

List of filter attributes to limit the list of messages to be shown.

DisplayMessage ( s )

Parameters

s: path

the DBus path of the message to show

CreateMessage ( a{sv} )

Parameters

a{sv}: values

Values to be prefilled for the new message
